changelogversion.changelogtext: Siad (Sia node) output now also appears in the terminal page
Update Android support libraries. This should hopefully fix some infrequent crashes some users were having
Fix error when trying to send
Fix unconfirmed transactions not appearing in transactions list
Fix USD price estimation (mostly - might have to manual refresh since coincap seems to take a while to respond to requests)
Disallow certain invalid urls from remote node address that would cause crashes
Cold storage wallet can now estimate your confirmed balance and transactions (experimental)
Higher resolution images in About slideshow
Make the about page better and cooler
Improve a lot of backend code
Wallet seed is shown immediately upon creating a wallet
Disallow setting empty/blank values for settings input fields
